mapper.insert: insert into `goods`(goodsName, context, number, max, min, price, username) values (#{goodsName}, #{context}, #{number}, #{max}, #{min}, #{price}, #{username})
mapper.update: update goods set goodsName=#{goodsName}, context=#{context}, number=#{number}, max=#{max}, min=#{min}, price=#{price}, username=#{username} where id = #{id}
